SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output type of DSG. Only effective for the CMOS type IC.

ItemList.Item: DSG outputs Low when no events (i.e. outputs Hi-Z or High when events occur)
DSG outputs Hi-Z or High when no events (i.e. outputs Low when events occur)

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output state of DSG when protection events occur.

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output type of CHG. Only effective for the CMOS type IC.

ItemList.Item: CHG outputs Low when no events (i.e. outputs Hi-Z or High when events occur)
CHG outputs Hi-Z or High when no events (i.e. outputs Low when events occur)

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output state of CHG when protection events occur.

ItemList.Item: Output the 20Hz square wave on SDA with internal weak pull-up when DOT occurs
Don not output the 20Hz square wave on SDA when DOT occurs

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: Disable or enable the 20Hz square wave output on SDA when DOT occurs. Only effective in Standalone mode.

ItemList.Item: Enable a same current flow out from TREF and TS when SDA is high
Disable a same current flow out from TREF and TS when SDA is high, so TREF and TS are in Hi-Z output

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies how to share the thermal resistor with the Microcontroller. Only effective in Standalone mode

ItemList.Item: Do not need software to clear the event flags so as to release the protections
Need software to clear the event flags so as to release the protections

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies how to release protection events. Only effective in I2C mode.

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: OV protection threshold for each cell

ItemList.Item: Do not initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs
Initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: It specifies whether to initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs.

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: UV protection threshold for each cell

ItemList.Item: select OVP range 4.0V~4.5V for Li_ion Cobalt//Monganate type
select OVP range 3.5V~4.0V for Li_ion Phosphate type

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: OV protection delay scan-cycle. This setting is effective for VOVP1, VOVP2 and VOVP3.

SFL.Name: EFUSE Config
SFL.Description: Hysteresis for OV protection release. This setting is effective for VOVP1, VOVP2 and VOVP3.

ItemList.Item: don't output UV status on CHGPAD
select OVP range 4.0V~4.5V for Li_ion Cobalt type
select OVP range 3.5V~4.0V for Li_ion Phosphate type

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output type of DSG. Only effective for the CMOS type IC.

ItemList.Item: DSG outputs Low when no events (i.e. outputs Hi-Z or High when events occur)
DSG outputs Hi-Z or High when no events (i.e. outputs Low when events occur)

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output state of DSG when protection events occur.

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output type of CHG. Only effective for the CMOS type IC.

ItemList.Item: CHG outputs Low when no events (i.e. outputs Hi-Z or High when events occur)
CHG outputs Hi-Z or High when no events (i.e. outputs Low when events occur)

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies the output state of CHG when protection events occur.

ItemList.Item: Output the 20Hz square wave on SDA with internal weak pull-up when DOT occurs
Don not output the 20Hz square wave on SDA when DOT occurs

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: Disable or enable the 20Hz square wave output on SDA when DOT occurs. Only effective in Standalone mode.

ItemList.Item: Enable a same current flow out from TREF and TS when SDA is high
Disable a same current flow out from TREF and TS when SDA is high, so TREF and TS are in Hi-Z output

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies how to share the thermal resistor with the Microcontroller. Only effective in Standalone mode

ItemList.Item: Do not need software to clear the event flags so as to release the protections
Need software to clear the event flags so as to release the protections

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies how to release protection events. Only effective in I2C mode.

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: OV protection threshold for each cell

ItemList.Item: Do not initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs
Initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: It specifies whether to initiate protection on CHG when UV occurs.

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: UV protection threshold for each cell

ItemList.Item: select OVP range 4.0V~4.5V for Li_ion Cobalt//Monganate type
select OVP range 3.5V~4.0V for Li_ion Phosphate type

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: OV protection delay scan-cycle. This setting is effective for VOVP1, VOVP2 and VOVP3.

SFL.Name: Register Config
SFL.Description: Hysteresis for OV protection release. This setting is effective for VOVP1, VOVP2 and VOVP3.
